entry.title: like a feather of flames on me
entry.summary:
Author: Val_in_a_trenchcoat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,148Chapters: 13/22Kudos: 154

Summary: Evan ‚Äì Buck ‚Äì Buckley is a twenty-eight-year old broke college student recently ripped away from his childhood dream job as a firefighter after a life-shattering accident left him permanently disabled. Living on what‚Äôs left of his savings while going to college won‚Äôt keep him fed, though‚Ä¶ but nobody has to know about his scandalous job on the side with Redline Pleasure Anonymous Call Agency. Eddie Diaz is a recently divorced, thirty-year-old college professor and father to the best kid in the world. In light of his recent split, though, he‚Äôs made a discovery: his sexuality might not be as straight and narrow as he‚Äôs always thought. Instead of panicking, though, he makes the safe, sensible (and budget-breaking) decision to set a hypothesis and test it by calling in to a sex hotline to talk to a male agent. Everyone experiments in college, right? Even the professors. Enter the mysterious Firehose ‚Äì the hot voice on the other side of the line that Eddie can‚Äôt get out of his head.And Buck might just be getting a little crush on the hot professor he keeps doing silent study sessions with in the college library.What will they do when it all collides? [updates every Thursday]

entry.title: For Life.
entry.summary:
Author: power_moves

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,763Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 28

Summary: "Buck didn't have a daughter. Sure, he loved kids and maybe one day he would build his own little family, but not right now. He just couldn't bear this type of responsibility - the kind that demanded more than he was able to give, more than he thought he could handle. Then one phone call suddenly changed everything. A number he didn't recognize. A professional voice talking to him, her words not making sense. "Her birth certificate states that you're her father."" Or Buck learns he has a seventeen year old daughter that just lost her mom and is now supposed to live with him. TW: old injuries, pain, emotional distress

entry.title: Check my phone any day (But don't be shocked if you find something)
entry.summary:
Author: fUcK_yOu_GaYbO

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,343Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 39

Summary: Buck is still in shock, did that really just happen? Is Bobby really dead? A million thoughts ran through his head at once. His ears were ringing and his cheeks burned from tears. He could hear Athena scream crying something at someone but he just couldn‚Äôt pay attention to anything or anyone at the moment. His heart stung, he knew it wasn‚Äôt true but this just felt like one more person in his life abandoning him. First his parents, then Maddie then Eddie and now- oh shit- EddieEddie- suddenly all of Buck's thoughts stopped and he just had one, ‚ÄúHas anyone told Eddie what happened?‚Äù the thought rang through his head.

That can only make it better, right? ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre trying to distract me,‚Äù he throws over his shoulder. Summary: By the time his last class rolls around, Eddie is on the verge of tears. He fucked up. He never should‚Äôve bothered with college, this clearly isn‚Äôt the right path for him. He smacks into it, stumbling and nearly falling until two callused hands grip his upper arms, steadying him. ‚ÄúW-whoa, sorry man. I did not see you there.‚Äù¬† Startled, Eddie glances up. He‚Äôs met with bright blue eyes, blinking at him sheepishly. entry.title: It isn‚Äôt perfect but it might be.
entry.summary:
Author: cowboylikerhi (drzugzwang)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,856Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 1

Summary: ùôÑùôâ ùôíùôÉùôÑùòæùôÉ; the Buckley family tree is built on the foundations of seeded secrets and tormented truths, living in the environment that never was made to grow. The root of their tree was nothing but toxic, scrapping at the bark, begging to be let out. Maddie, Maxine and Evan suffocated for years, those seeds seeping into every crescent that London had to offer. They didn't have lives, not really. Everything was tainted by everything that came before them. Only when they move across the world, cutting themselves from the line that held them together so tightly - that those branches really did start to feel like they could grow. And maybe 118 wasn‚Äôt perfect, but to the three of them, it might as well be. (Aka I made the Buckleys British, gave them a younger sister. And wayyyy more trauma)

entry.title: Develop Me in the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: whisperingcherries

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,896Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 7

Summary: It‚Äôs supposed to be simple: Eddie is the student, Buck is the professor, and the rules are clear. But every lecture tightens the air between them, every critique feels personal, and every night in the darkroom pushes them closer to a line they can‚Äôt afford to cross. As want turns into need and fear turns into something softer, Buck has to decide what‚Äôs more dangerous‚Äîbreaking the rules, or pretending he doesn‚Äôt love the man who makes him feel seen for the first time.

entry.title: Evan, Steady
entry.summary:
Author: 79KJ01

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,961Chapters: 12/15Kudos: 13

Summary: The year starts with smoke and ends in blood. Between the fires, the calls, and the people he refuses to lose, Evan learns that being steady has nothing to do with standing still. The city keeps burning, the family keeps breaking, and every choice costs more than it should. Some seasons don‚Äôt offer closure‚Äîonly the truth left behind when the sirens fade.

entry.title: All the Ways Home
entry.summary:
Author: 79KJ01

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,534Chapters: 25/30Kudos: 316

Summary: After the lawsuit, Evan Buckley built a new life outside the 118‚Äîquiet, careful, controlled. But Los Angeles has a way of pulling him back, and some fires never really go out. When Buck and Eddie find themselves working side-by-side again, the distance they built starts to crumble under everything they never said. From fractured trust to found family, this is a story about healing, home, and the love that finally stops running.

entry.title: Buddie - the bane of Ravi's existance
entry.summary:
Author: stargazingstormtrooper92

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,735Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 140

Summary: "Buck, is this why you ditched us tonight? I thought tonight was our night together?"Buck panicked looked over to Chris then Eddie then the girl who huffed out a hysterical laugh."Oh great. Men! You really are all the same, aren't you."She started buttoning her shirt and taking her heels from the floor while going to the door. But then, she stopped next to Eddie and said:"He didn't wear a ring, just so you know. I wouldn't done anything if I knew he was married with a child."*** Or: Eddie and Chris crash Buck's date night. Buck's date thinks Buddie are married. Ravi is over our lil fruity boys and they finally talk to each other, yay?!
